title: Media College Denmark
subtitle: to acquire and improve my skills in web development and design, I enrolled in college, where I am also expanding my knowledge in UX/UI design. During my studies, I focus on prototyping, wireframing, and creating designs in Figma, as well as designing logos in Illustrator. Additionally, i am mastering the use of Photoshop to enhance the graphic quality of images and create high-quality graphic design elements.

title: My Internship at Superego
subtitle: Superego Holstebro was my first experience in the IT field specifically in production. It is an excellent place where I gained not only practical knowledge but also great enjoyment from the work. During my internship, I became familiar with modern CMS platforms, learned frameworks such as TailwindCSS and Next.js, and developed a new perspective on UI/UX design. Working with the CMS Sanity allowed me to dive into the world of TypeScript for the first time. I would like to especially highlight the team I worked with: thanks to their support and expertise, I received a strong motivation for further learning and growth in the IT field.
